title: Dayforce PayAdjustments Schema
description: Schema definition for inserting or updating PayAdjustments in Dayforce.

EmployeePayAdjustXRefCode.description: External reference code for the specific Pay Adjustment record.

OrgUnitXRefCode.description: External reference code identifying the organization unit.

EmployeeXRefCode.description: External reference code identifying the employee.

PayAdjustmentCodeXRefCode.description: Code for the Pay Adjustment type (e.g., LOA_ICI).

PayAdjustmentDate.description: Date and time the pay adjustment applies to.

Hours.description: Number of hours associated with the adjustment.

JobXRefCode.description: External reference code for the job, if applicable.

DepartmentXRefCode.description: External reference code for the department, if applicable.

PayCategoryXRefCode.description: External reference code for the pay category, if applicable.

ProjectXRefCode.description: External reference code for the project, if applicable.

DocketXRefCode.description: External reference code for the docket, if applicable.

IsPremium.description: Indicates if this adjustment is premium pay.

IsDeleted.description: Flag to mark the adjustment as deleted.

PayDate.description: Date when the pay is issued.

ReferenceDate.description: Reference date for the pay adjustment.

ManagerAuthorized.description: Indicates if the manager has authorized the adjustment.

EmployeeAuthorized.description: Indicates if the employee has authorized the adjustment.

AdjustPeriodStartDate.description: Start date and time of the adjustment period.

AdjustPeriodEndDate.description: End date and time of the adjustment period.
